content.text:
# Battle of Narva

Battle of Narva may refer to:
*Siege of Narva (1558), a battle between State of the Teutonic Order and Tsardom of Russia, part of the Livonian War (1558–1583)
*Siege of Narva (1581), a battle between Kingdom of Sweden and Tsardom of Russia, part of the Livonian War (1558–1583)
*Siege of Narva (1590)  a battle between Kingdom of Sweden and Tsardom of Russia, part of the Russo-Swedish War (1590–1595)
*Battle of Narva (1700), a battle between Kingdom of Sweden and Tsardom of Russia, part of the Great Northern War
*Siege of Narva (1704), a battle between Kingdom of Sweden and Tsardom of Russia, part of the Great Northern War
*Battle of Narva (1918), the starting event of the Estonian War of Independence (1918–1920) between Estonia and Soviet Russia
*Battle of Utria, a battle near Narva between Estonia and Soviet Russia in January 1919
*Battle of Krivasoo, a battle near Narva between Estonia and Soviet Russia in November–December 1919
*Bombing of Narva in World War II (1941–1944) aerial campaign by the Soviet Union against Narva in the then German-occupied Estonia, part of World War II
*Battle of Narva (1944), between Nazi Germany and the Soviet Union, part of World War II
**First phase: Battle for Narva Bridgehead
**Second phase: Battle of Tannenberg Line
